Articles.Content:
I've been lurking the forums long enough, and I've decided its time to show off some of my creations. With 0.23 right around the corner, I've realized my slow and steady approach to career mode has led to some nice designs for exploring Kerbin, but my Kerbals have yet to leave LKO, and my space agency has yet to get a probe outside the Kerbin system. (not that I haven't had a capable rocket and probe, my Mun landers could've probably made the trip to Duna with how much extra DeltaV they landed with).

I've just been having too much fun flying around to different biomes and establishing a communication network than to time accelerate my way to a transfer window.

I was going to create an album for each mission, but I realized that this would be a long post, so I've simply split them into a couple of picture heavy albums. Enjoy!

Aircraft Division

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Vertical Flight

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Probes

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Manned Spaceflight (coming soon)

Edited December 17, 2013 by Chris P. Bacon
